Transition.Guard: Arm.ArmOperations.isAtOperation( Sett(angleServo1), Sett(angleServo2), Sett(angleServo3), Sett(angleServo4), Sett(angleServo5), Sett(angleServo6), Sett(angle_resolution)) = true

State.Name: initialPos
State.Entry: Arm.ArmOperations.rotateAllServosOperation( Sett(angleServo1), Sett(angleServo2), Sett(angleServo3), Sett(angleServo4), Sett(angleServo5), Sett(angleServo6), Sett(setTime));

Transition.Guard: Arm.ArmOperations.isAtOperation( Sett(angleServo1), Sett(angleServo2), Sett(angleServo3), Sett(angleServo4), Sett(angleServo5), Sett(angleServo6), Sett(angle_resolution)) = false

State.Name: readyPos
secondPos
finalPos

Command.Name: rotateAllServos
Command.CommandAction: ArmOperations.rotateAllServosOperation( CmdArg(rotateAllServos.angle1), CmdArg(rotateAllServos.angle2), CmdArg(rotateAllServos.angle3), CmdArg(rotateAllServos.angle4), CmdArg(rotateAllServos.angle5), CmdArg(rotateAllServos.angle6), CmdArg(rotateAllServos.aTime));

Command.Name: readAllServos
Command.CommandAction: ArmOperations.readAllServosOperation();

Command.Name: cameraColor
Command.CommandAction: ArmOperations.cameraColorOperation( CmdArg(cameraColor.aTime));

Command.Name: isAt
Command.CommandAction: ArmOperations.isAtOperation( CmdArg(isAt.angle1isAt), CmdArg(isAt.angle2isAt), CmdArg(isAt.angle3isAt), CmdArg(isAt.angle4isAt), CmdArg(isAt.angle5isAt), CmdArg(isAt.angle6isAt), CmdArg(isAt.angle_res));

Command.Name: wait
Command.CommandAction: ArmOperations.waitOperation( CmdArg(wait.aTime));

Command.Name: posInicial
Command.CommandAction: ArmOperations.posInicialOperation(CmdArg(posInicial.aTime));

Command.Name: rotateServo
Command.CommandAction: ServosOperations.rotateServoOperation( CmdArg(rotateServo.id), CmdArg(rotateServo.angle), CmdArg(rotateServo.aTime));

Command.Name: readServo
Command.CommandAction: ServosOperations.readServoOperation( CmdArg(readServo.id));

Command.Name: isAt
Command.CommandAction: ServosOperations.isAtSingleOperation( CmdArg(isAt.id), CmdArg(isAt.angle), CmdArg(isAt.angle_res));

Command.Name: rotateServoOperation
Command.CommandAction: Dofbot dof = new Dofbot(); return dof.rotateServo(id, angle, aTime);

Command.Name: readServoOperation
Command.CommandAction: Dofbot dof = new Dofbot(); return dof.readServo(id);

Command.Name: isAtSingleOperation
Command.CommandAction: Dofbot dof = new Dofbot(); return dof.isAtSingle(id, angle, angle_res);

Command.Name: buzzerOn
Command.CommandAction: BuzzerOperations.buzzerOnOperation( CmdArg(buzzerOn.aTime));

Command.Name: buzzerOff
Command.CommandAction: BuzzerOperations.buzzerOffOperation();

Command.Name: buzzerOnOperation
Command.CommandAction: Dofbot dof = new Dofbot(); dof.buzzerOn(aTime);

Command.Name: buzzerOffOperation
Command.CommandAction: Dofbot dof = new Dofbot(); dof.buzzerOff();

Command.Name: lightRGB
Command.CommandAction: LightOperations.lightRGBOperation( CmdArg(lightRGB.r), CmdArg(lightRGB.g), CmdArg(lightRGB.b));

Command.Name: lightRGBOperation
Command.CommandAction: Dofbot dof = new Dofbot(); return dof.lightRGB(r,g,b);

Command.Name: cameraColor
Command.CommandAction: CameraOperations.cameraColorOperation( CmdArg(cameraColor.aTime));

Command.Name: calibration
Command.CommandAction: CameraOperations.calibrationOperation( CmdArg(calibration.color), CmdArg(calibration.Hmin), CmdArg(calibration.Smin), CmdArg(calibration.Vmin), CmdArg(calibration.Hmax), CmdArg(calibration.Smax), CmdArg(calibration.Vmax));

Command.Name: cameraColorOperation
Command.CommandAction: Dofbot dof = new Dofbot(); return dof.cameraColor(aTime);

Command.Name: calibrationOperation
Command.CommandAction: Dofbot dof = new Dofbot(); dof.colorConfiguration(color, Hmin, Smin, Vmin, Hmax, Smax, Vmax);

Command.Name: rotateAllServosOperation
Command.CommandAction: Dofbot dof = new Dofbot(); return dof.rotateAllServos(angle1, angle2, angle3, angle4, angle5, angle6, aTime);

Command.Name: readAllServosOperation
cameraColorOperation
Command.CommandAction: Dofbot dof = new Dofbot(); return dof.cameraColor(aTime);

Command.Name: isAtOperation
Command.CommandAction: Dofbot dof = new Dofbot(); return dof.isAt(angle1isAt, angle2isAt, angle3isAt, angle4isAt, angle5isAt, angle6isAt, angle_res);

Command.Name: waitOperation
Command.CommandAction: Thread.Sleep(aTime);

Command.Name: posInicialOperation
Command.CommandAction: Dofbot dof = new Dofbot(); return dof.straightPosition(aTime);
